growthCards.title: Hybrid Business Model
growthCards.description: Combining international market competitiveness with high-margin local SME specialization for sustainable growth and revenue stability.

growthCards.title: SME Focused Expertise
growthCards.description: Deep understanding of Pakistani SME needs, delivering professional web solutions that bridge the local digitization gap effectively.

growthCards.title: Process Driven Delivery
growthCards.description: Structured, milestone-based development workflow ensuring on-time, on-budget project delivery with complete transparency.

growthCards.title: Scalable Solutions
growthCards.description: Future-proof digital products built for long-term growth with recurring revenue services for ongoing business success.

processSteps.title: Requirement Analysis
processSteps.description: Comprehensive discovery of business needs, target market analysis, and conversion-focused goal setting for your digital solution.

processSteps.title: Milestone Planning
processSteps.description: Transparent project breakdown with clear deliverables, timelines, and budget allocation using our proven hybrid development approach.

processSteps.title: Development & Integration
processSteps.description: Building scalable solutions using modern stacks (MERN/WordPress) with local system integrations for Pakistani market needs.

processSteps.title: Quality Assurance
processSteps.description: Rigorous testing for performance, mobile optimization, and conversion effectiveness across all devices and platforms.

processSteps.title: Launch & Growth Support
processSteps.description: Smooth deployment with ongoing managed hosting, SEO, and maintenance services to ensure long-term digital success.
